attributes.action: £21,6000 per year for known terrorist £6000 per year for pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have worked for 50 years payed my tax and insurance now retired all i get for that is £6000 per year  and i am expected to live on that .Yet a known terrorist who hasn,t payed any monies into the british economy  can get £21,600 per year how is this justified

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
